labels.name: Defected Records
labels.notes: Major label. Demos with streamable links; WAV only; no artwork/promos. Accepts SoundCloud/Dropbox/WeTransfer links.

labels.name: Toolroom Records
labels.notes: Major label. Submit demos via Toolroom demo upload page.

labels.name: Soul Candi Records
labels.notes: Major label. Submit exclusively through website; originals only; specified genres only. No remixes/bootlegs/unauthorized samples.

labels.name: All Shades of The Drum Recordings
labels.notes: Mid-tier label. Demo submission form; provide artist details and demo link.

labels.name: Alter Soul Records
labels.notes: Underground label. Demo submission open; submit afro house/electronic track for review.

labels.name: Deep In Your Soul Records
labels.notes: Underground label. Only afro house demos via demo page; mentions feedback timeframe.

labels.name: NOS Recordings
labels.notes: Underground label. House-focused; submit up to 3 tracks per inquiry.

labels.name: Hacked Records
labels.notes: Underground label. Submit demos via website form with file upload and genre selection.

labels.name: Black Bore Records
labels.notes: Underground label. Open demo submission page; MP3 320kbps; naming + finished tracks guidelines. Response time up to two weeks.

labels.name: Fourfloor Records
labels.notes: Underground label. Submit techno demos via form; SoundCloud preferred.

labels.name: Superpos Records
labels.notes: Underground label. Demo submission form; genres of interest include techno/melodic/house.

labels.name: DnB Doctor
labels.notes: Underground label. Submit neurofunk DnB demos; guidelines on page.

labels.name: DnB Allstars
labels.notes: Mid-tier label. LabelRadar portal indicates label is waiting for demo submissions.
